p: The writhing test is the best assay used for the estimation of the analgesic activity of plant materials. It has also been described that when acetic acid injected into the peritoneal cavity it promotes an increase of COX and LOX products in peritoneal fluids along with the release of several other inflammatory mediators which finally stimulate the primary afferent nociceptors entering the dorsal horn of the central nervous system ( Subedi et al., 2016). The extract and crude alkaloids from Z. armatum at different doses were capable to decrease writhing reaction pointedly and this was probably facilitated by prostaglandins inhibition mechanism ( Kifayatullah et al., 2019; Subedi et al., 2016).
